exits.description: <color=purple>the cave ahead. surely they went in there.</color>

description: <color=purple>they must have hid in one of the caves.</color>the storm is raging. so much water, running like blood, <color=purple> you have done well, NOW, THE CAVE</color>blood and water running down the stones from the head
investigationDescription: <color=purple>DELAY NO</color>snapped off the leg, trapped and screaming<color=purple>LONGER. THE CAVE.</color>
